001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc;
002
003import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
004
005/**
006 * Interface for an Asynchronous JSON-RPC Server/Service.
007 *
008 * A service-layer abstraction of JSON-RPC using plain old Java objects (POJOs)
009 * Can easily be used in controllers from Java Web frameworks.
010 *
011 */
012public interface JsonRpcService {
013    /**
014     * Handle a JSON-RPC {@link JsonRpcRequest} and return a {@link JsonRpcResponse} POJO
015     * <p>
016     * @param req A Request object
017     * @param <RSLT> Generic type for the JSON-RPC <b>result</b> in {@link JsonRpcResponse#getResult()}
018     * @return a future for a Response object with either a <b>result</b> or an error.
019     */
020    <RSLT> CompletableFuture<JsonRpcResponse<RSLT>> call(JsonRpcRequest req);
021}
